attributes.action: make members of parliament give back their second homes (payed for by the tax-payer)  when they leave office or reach retirement age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the right hon.David Blunket wants pensioners to cash in their home equity to pay for any care they may need.  Then it is only fair to take back the M.P,s free homes and put the revenue back into the care of pensioners.  LET THEM RETIRE WITH DIGNITY. Many have paid for this care through their years of PAYE and National insurance contributions. If they want second homes they have to pay for them out of their own money.
